summary:
BCS Recycling Specialists Asset Management, founded in 1988, is a nationwide provider of comprehensive reverse logistics and asset management services. The company operates as a complete reverse logistics resource, helping businesses manage surplus, returns, and end-of-life assets through environmentally responsible solutions. Their core services are organized around four key areas: recycle, re-use, repair, and report, with a strong emphasis on maximizing recovery value and landfill diversion for clients across retail, financial, manufacturing, and other industries.

The company maintains a national footprint with warehouse locations in Indiana and Georgia, field offices in Florida and Texas, and corporate headquarters in Canoga Park, California. BCS holds multiple certifications from Orion Registrar, Inc. and is registered with the EPA at both federal and state levels. They pride themselves on being 100% eco-friendly and diverting 100% of electronic waste from landfills. Their proprietary Smart Sort and Separation (S3) program achieves 95% efficiency in electronic waste processing, and they offer certified destruction services with proof of destruction available to clients.
